Title: UndoRedo
Description: UndoRedo functions to only INotifyPropertyChanging support class
HomeWiki:
Features
  • Easy way to undo and redo changes objects properties.
  • Minimum requirements to use.
  • No additional programming more than INotifyPropertyChanging support.

Functions
  • Any changes to all properties of all elements of the collection will be stored in the undo system.
  • No additional programming in custom class more than support changing notification.

Requirements for user-defined type
  • Use notification before changing the properties to use in the undo system.
  • Derived from ObservableCollection<T>, where T: INotifyPropertyChanging.
